# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a button mask with the specified raw value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: Int)
```

## Creating button masks

- **button(_:)**: Creates a button mask from the specified button index.

items.description: Creates a button mask from the specified button index.
items.name: button(_:)
